header.description: No header scalars. The report has no title-block tokens.

rows.description: One row per timestamp record from neuract__LT_TABLE. Each row carries the formatted timestamp and 28 LT instrument readings (LT_122 is absent from the DB and will render blank).

semantics: No mandatory filter parameters are defined. If the caller supplies optional date-range parameters (from_date / to_date), they should be applied as inclusive range filters on neuract__LT_TABLE.timestamp_utc.
transformations: No reshape: all columns are direct projections from neuract__LT_TABLE.
row_level_transmitter displays timestamp_utc formatted as DD-MM-YYYY HH:MM:SS.
All LT reading columns are numeric floats; format to 2 decimal places.
row_lt_122 has no catalog source and will be rendered as an empty string.
